<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1128327_cake_settings</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1128327_cake_settings">name=Hourly rate^valueVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Hourly rate"/><item endquery="false" field="value" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Hourly Rate Changed, Recalc Good Prices</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	const hourlyRate = parseFloat(current.getValue("value"));
	const goodGR = new GlideRecord("x_1128327_cake_good");
	goodGR.addQuery("state", "!=", "30"); // Not retired
	goodGR.query();
	
	while (goodGR.next()) {
		const prepDurationString = goodGR.getValue("preparation_time");
		const durationParts = prepDurationString.split(" ")[1].split(":");
		const hours = parseInt(durationParts[0]);
		const minutes = parseInt(durationParts[1]);
		const totalHours = hours + (minutes/60);
		
		const prepCost = (hourlyRate * totalHours).toFixed(2);
		goodGR.preparation_cost = prepCost;
		goodGR.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>reece.poulsen</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-22 03:01:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>61bd41d647c102105e94ae4b116d43e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hourly Rate Changed, Recalc Good Prices</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Cake Boss" source="x_1128327_cake">076166bb472002105e94ae4b116d43c9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cake Boss">076166bb472002105e94ae4b116d43c9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_61bd41d647c102105e94ae4b116d43e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>reece.poulsen</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-22 03:01:41</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=61bd41d647c102105e94ae4b116d43e8"/></record_update>
